custom_css: .col h2 {font-size: 1.05em; font-weight: 900 !important; color: #444444; margin-bottom: 0.3em; font-family: "Work Sans", sans-serif !important;}
.col a {color: rgb(105, 108, 255); font-weight: 700; text-decoration: none; font-size: 1.1em;}
